taxon.author: (O. Pickard-Cambridge, 1880)
taxon.distribution: South America. Introduced to Europe, Canary Is. to Egypt and Turkey, South Africa, China, Malaysia, Indonesia, New Zealand

referenceObject.reference: Pickard-Cambridge, O. (1880a). On some new and rare spiders from New Zealand, with characters of four new genera. Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London 47(4, for 1879): 681-703, Pl. LII-LIII.
